content:
# I have successfully moved to the position (22.5, -14.5). 
# Now that I am in a new position, I will check my player position explicitly to confirm that it has updated correctly.

# Step 43: Fetch my player position explicitly to verify the current coordinates.
player_entities = get_entities({Prototype.Player})  # Attempt to retrieve my player position from the existing entities
assert player_entities, "No player entity found, unable to confirm player position."  # Assert that I have identifiable entities for position
player_position = player_entities[0].position  # Extract my player position from the entity list
print(f"My current position is {player_position}.")  # Output the current player position.
